Summary: looking @ u.s.air flight overhead from N.Y.Citys LaGuardia airport taking off-- silver/metalic object
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around July 9th 2007
divs: sighting detailsabout 11a.m. this morning (july 9,2007), while watching planes take off from nearby la guardia airport (queens,n.y.c.)for about 10 to 15 min.(as i usually do with my binocculars) i trailed a u.s. air flight overhead for a few seconds , until it faded off to the west. looking at the rear of the plane ,i spot a silver\metalic like reflection in the corner of my view to the right. its not interupting the plane , but would be considered in its general airspace.(or maybe the plane is in "its" airspace :hmmmmm?)i watched it for a min. ,then lost it for about 30 sec.s , then spotted it again (appears to be twirling , because of the reflection of the sun on it-no lights!, no sound!no exaust!) lost it again! (never moved binocculars from object 2nd time, but still ,it disappeared!) [temp.90d\humid\blue sky] this same object i saw a week ago over a cloud to the s.e. and for the first time june 20 ,2007 (reported to m.u.f.o.n.6\20\2007 @1:58 p.m.\e.s.t.)------they r over new york city too --- always thought only rural\country areas-not!........eye n the sky >>>>m1 from the bronx,nyc
